root: ^Tim` I don't think I want to perform again.

c-0: ^Tim` I know. And I do love it, I really do! But now I'm not sure I'll be able to separate my performance from death.
^Tim` But don't worry. I'm not making any life-changing decisions just yet.
^Tim` I need some space to think before I do.
^Player` Just don't let something sad get in the way of doing what you want to do.
